name: Lapso [DEMO]
description:
Hey, we are islaOliva Games a two-person indie video game development studio based in Tenerife, Canary Islands (Spain). We are developing our first project: LAPSO. Check out our game and add to your WISHLIST on Steam.

FOLLOW US

Twitter @islaOlivaGames
Instagram @islaOlivaGames
Steam LAPSO
YouTube islaOliva Games
Patreon islaOliva Games

CONTACT

You can report a bug or send us feedback through the game. When you are in Rockrose go to the menu and at the top right click on the "send feedback" button. This will send your message, a screenshot of where you are (in the game, we mean) and technical information about your computer (CPU, GPU, RAM and Windows version) to make our work easier.

You can also write us to our email islaolivagames@gmail.com or contact us on our social networks listed above.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

MINIMUM

OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 SP2 64-bit or later
Processor: Intel G4560/Athlon 200GE or better
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: GT 1030/RX 460 or better
Storage: 3 GB available space
Additional Notes: Target for 900p, Medium Settings, 30fps

RECOMMENDED

OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 SP2 64-bit or later
Processor: Intel i5 8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: GTX 1060/RX 580 or better
Storage: 3 GB available space
Additional Notes: Target for 1080, High Settings, 60fps
